title: Federalism is what type of political system

content.prompt: In the United States political system, the term Federalism refers to

choices.label: limits on the powers of the state governments
limits on the powers of the national government
the division of powers between the levels of government
legal authority of the courts to hear cases

topic.text: 1.7: Relationship Between the States and National Government

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
